scripts.dev:all: concurrently --names "NEXT,EXPRESS,GRAPHQL,PROXY" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta,yellow,green" "cd apps/nextjs-app && PORT=3000 npm run dev" "cd apps/express-server && PORT=3001 npm run dev" "cd apps/graphql-server && PORT=4000 npm run dev" "node dev-proxy.js"
scripts.dev:all:custom: concurrently --names "CUSTOM,EXPRESS,GRAPHQL,PROXY" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta,yellow,green" "cd apps/nextjs-app && PORT=3000 npm run dev:custom" "cd apps/express-server && PORT=3001 npm run dev" "cd apps/graphql-server && PORT=4000 npm run dev" "node dev-proxy.js"
